about: My name is Nadzeya Stashkevich. I was born in the Minsk city in 1994. In 2011, I received a school education, then entered the medical university. After graduating from university, I worked as a pediatrician. In 2021, I decided to change my specialization and become a web developer, I began to independently study the technologies for creating web pages and applications.
name: Nadzeya Stashkevich

education.educationTitle: Video tutorials on YouTube, online courses on Stepik.org
education.educationText: Web pages layout in HTML and CSS according to Figma layouts. SCSS and SASS preprocessors. Responsive web design, multimedia. Bootstrap library. Setting up VS Code plugins. Using DevTools. JS basics.

RS School, JS/Frontend preparatory course. Stage #0: Markdown. Working with Git, GitHub. Chrome Dev Tools and VS Code. CSS Flex. Solving problems on Codewars. JS data types, algorithms, loops. Working with the DOM Webpack basics. NodeJS, NPM. Сreating projects on JS and Webpack.

RS School, JS/Frontend course. Stages #1-2: Git, GitHub. Responsive design, media queries, CSS Flex, SCSS. Algorithmic tasks, functions, Scope. Working with Figma HTML forms, DOM, DOM events. Modules in JS, WebPack. Server interaction. OOP, classes. Codewars. Interviews with mentors. Working with TypeScript, ESLint. Development UI components, creation of team projects.

projects.Momentum: widget for the Chrome browser, an analogue of the application of the same name
projects.OnlineZoo: website with information about animals from various zoos
projects.Songbird: quiz app for recognizing birds by their voices
projects.TrelloClone: analogue of the application of the same name for task management, team project
